short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: incredibox-sprunki-but-somewhat-funni is a game of the Incredibox Sprunki genre.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience a twisted take on the classic Incredibox universe with this Hacked Sprunki mod, where Mr. Fun Computer's digital transformation leads to unexpected consequences. As rain triggers a catastrophic glitch event, watch familiar characters evolve into corrupted computer versions of themselves, creating an eerily beautiful musical experience. This modification features unique character redesigns, glitch-based sound effects, and a compelling narrative about Mr. Fun Computer's search for his digital family. Perfect for fans of the original Incredibox who want to explore a darker, more experimental version of the beloved music creation game.
